Uses of Class
com.github.hugorouillard.dataframe.Dataframe

  • Uses of Dataframe in com.github.hugorouillard.dataframe

    Methods in com.github.hugorouillard.dataframe that return Dataframe
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Dataframe
    Dataframe.filterRows(String columnLabel, Predicate<Object> condition)
    Returns a new Dataframe containing only the rows for which the given predicate evaluates to true, based on the values in a specified column.
    Dataframe
    Dataframe.selectColumns(String... labels)
    Returns a new Dataframe containing only the specified columns (by labels).
    Dataframe
    Dataframe.selectRows(int... indices)
    Returns a new Dataframe containing only the specified rows (by index).
    Dataframe
    Dataframe.selectRowsRange(int from, int to)
    Returns a new Dataframe containing only the specified rows (by range).
